updates.title: Desert Tower
updates.content:
After a long wait v0.5 is finally ready.
      This version includes:
      
      - A brand new construction mechanic.
      - A new location with an up-close city perspective.
      - Deeper strategy by being able to:
        -- transfer scientists between locations.
        -- allocate Auto Juice Buyers between locations.
      - More music and skins.
      - More inventions and adjusted balance.
      - More trivia questions.
